敒字的基本解释

敒
shēn
理；治。
古同“伸”。

敒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shēn］
［《集韻》升人切，平真，書。］
(1)理；治。
(2)同“伸”。

敒字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敒； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页471第10
【廣韻】【集韻】?直刃切，音陣。【說文】理也。【類篇】治也。　又【集韻】升人切，音申。義同。　又【集韻】癡隣切，音胂。與伸同。申也，引戾也。　又辰陵切，音承。義同。

敒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
敒字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
敒
shēn
理; Governance.
Gu Tong "stretched".
敒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shēn]
["Ji Yun" ascend to cut, plain, book. ]
(1) Reason; governance.
(2) Same as "stretching".
敒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　敒; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 471 10
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Straight blade cutting, sound array. [Said Wen] Li also. 【Classes】Governance.　[Jiyun] Ascend to be cut, sound application. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] idiotic neighbor cut, sound corpus. With the same. Shen Ye, Yin Hu Ye.　Chen Ling cut again, the sound inherited. The same meaning.
